item.description:
BE ADVISED, SEATING IS LIMITED at Grendels AFTER 5:30!

We meet this time at Grendel's Den downstairs. Grendels has an amazing half-price food menu daily from 5-7:30, (with the purchase of a minimum $3 beverage)! Half-price menu includes appetizers.

Harvard Square, the heart of intellectual razzmatazz, has already successfully hosted (every other Sunday) two Intellectual Snob Meetups with the unrepentant Nerd Fun Meetup! Some fellow nerds have even showed up with fake moustaches, glasses with fold-up sun flaps, and corduroy jackets with elbow patches!

This Meetup encourages intellectual snob appreciation, so AT THIS MEETUP snobs are encouraged to bring along your favorite prop of some kind to identify you intellectually, such as a favorite book or outfit. Or just bring your baffling, aloof opinions and a "stiff upper lip".
You don't have to be a genuine intellectual. "Pseudo-intellectuals" are also welcome to fake it! (See: "how to become a pseudo intellectual" on ehow.com).
For a test on whether or not you "qualify" as an Intellectual Snob, I recommend you "Google" (search on Google under) "Intellectual Snob Test Okcupid" for a fun & innocent introduction. (You do not need to sign in).

As in the last Meetup, name tags /index cards will again be passed around, for those who'd like to pose a question (answerable or unanswerable) or create a debate! (You scribble the question on your name tag).

Although street parking in Harvard Square on Sundays is "unrestricted", public transportation is recommended (parking space is limited).
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a Nerd Fun sign
item.name: Intellectual Snob Appreciation Meetup (GRENDEL'S)
